topic.title: Subject Data Non-Clinical Trials - conformance rules

section.p: This fundamental template contains the core document related information for reporting the experience of a non-human subject within a trial.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DOCCLIN" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.25 Confidentiality)
Documents the confidentiality level of the document.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
The effective date for the contents of the document.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
The identifier assigned to the subject data report. It is needed to uniquely identify a particular report of subject data from a study.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode
The language used for the document. The entry may be left out, if the language used is English.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] realmCode
Identifies a country or other administrative unit that has defined particular rules for the format or content of the clinical document.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] setId
An identifier that remains consistent across all revisions derived from a common original. In the first version of the document - VersonNumber = 1, setId and id will be identical.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] versionNumber
A unique identifier for a version of a report.
Contains exactly one [1..1] authorParticipation with data type Author Participation
Contains exactly one [1..1] studyRelationship with data type Study Relationship
Contains exactly one [1..1] subjectParticipation with data type Subject Participation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DOCCLIN" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] realmCode
Identifies a country or other administrative unit that has defined particular rules for the format or content of the clinical document.
Contains exactly one [1..1] typeId with data type Infrastructure Root Type Id

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
The identifier assigned to the subject data report. It is needed to uniquely identify a particular report of subject data from a study.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
The effective date for the contents of the document.

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.25 Confidentiality)
Documents the confidentiality level of the document.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] languageCode
The language used for the document. The entry may be left out, if the language used is English.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] setId
An identifier that remains consistent across all revisions derived from a common original. In the first version of the document - VersonNumber = 1, setId and id will be identical.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] versionNumber
A unique identifier for a version of a report.
Contains exactly one [1..1] authorParticipation with data type Author Participation
Contains exactly one [1..1] studyRelationship with data type Study Relationship
Contains exactly one [1..1] subjectParticipation with data type Subject Participation
Contains at least one [1..*] recordTarget, where its type is Record Target
Contains at least one [1..*] author, where its type is Author
Contains exactly one [1..1] custodian, where its type is Custodian
Contains exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Component2
